Title: Establishes an unemployment bridge program; establishes digital ad tax act; appropriation
Summary: Establishes an unemployment bridge program and an unemployment bridge program fund to provide wage replacement to workers that do not qualify for unemployment insurance or other worker wage assistance programs and who have lost a major source of income due to lost work (Part A); establishes the "Digital Ad Tax Act (DATA)" creating a tax on digital advertising services (Part B).
LawCode: Add §591-b, Lab L; add §95-l, St Fin L; add Art 15 §§330 - 334, §1816, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to establishing the unemployment bridge program; to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the unemployment bridge program fund; and making an appropriation therefor (Part A); and to amend the tax law, in relation to enacting the "Digital Ad Tax Act (DATA)" (Part B)
